info.title: MobileNetworkManagementClient
info.description: The resources in this swagger specification will be used to manage mobile network resources

parameters.name: networkName
parameters.description: The name of the network.

200.description: Delete successful.

202.description: Accepted. Sets 'Deleting' provisioningState until the operation completes. Returns an operation URI that can be queried to find the current state of the operation.

204.description: Request successful. Resource does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about the specified network.

parameters.name: networkName
parameters.description: The name of network.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting network resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: networkName
parameters.description: Name of network.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update network operation.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting network resource.

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting network resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: networkName
parameters.description: The name of the network.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to update network tags.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting network resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all the  networks in a subscription.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of network resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all the networks in a resource group.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of network resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

systemData.description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the network resource.

mobileCountryCode.description: The mobile country code for the network.

mobileNetworkCode.description: The mobile network code for the network.

spectrumAccessProvider.description: The spectrum access provider for the network.

packetCores.description: An array of ids of the packet cores associated with the network resource.

value.description: A list of networks in a resource group.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

NetworkListResult.description: Response for networks API service call.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the site resource. **TODO**: Confirm if this is needed.

customLocation.description: Azure arc custom location where the network site is paired. **TODO**: Confirm type and property.

trackingAreaCode.description: Tracking area code for the network site.

value.description: A list of sites in a resource group.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

systemData.description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the sim profile resource.

activationState.description: The activation state of the sim profile resource.

internationalMobileSubscriberIdentity.description: The International Mobile Subscriber Identity (IMSI) for the sim profile.

integratedCircuitCardIdentifier.description: The Integrated Circuit Card ID (ICC Id) for the sim profile.

authenticationKey.description: The ki value for the sim profile.

operatorKeyCode.description: The Opc value for the sim profile.

networks.description: A list of network ids that the sim profile is attached. **TODO** Typically one, but can a Sim be attached to multiple networks

value.description: A list of sim profile ids in a resource group.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

SimProfileListResult.description: Response for sim profiles API service call.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the access point resource.

packetDataNetworkName.description: The unique id of the mobile network

packetCore.description: The reference to the packet core.

dnsAddresses.description: The dns addresses of the access point.

userEquipmentAddressPoolPrefix.description: The user equipment address pool prefixe of the access point.

value.description: A list of access points in a resource group.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

AccessPointNameListResult.description: Response for access point s API service call.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the sim policy.
